feed.title: Wishlist Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Wishlist: v0.37.0 - Multi-Language Support!
entry.content:
Highlights

Wishlist is now has full support for localization (translations). So far only a few languages are available, so if you don't see your language or it isn't fully translated, please consider contributing! Details for contributing can be found in the readme

  • I18n by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/173

Bug Fixes

  • Appropriately apply rotation to uploaded images before conversion by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/198

Other Changes

  • Add german by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/192
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/193
  • Update README.md by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/197

New Contributors

  • @weblate made their first contribution in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/193

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/compare/v0.36.2...v0.37.0

entry.title: New release for Wishlist: v0.38.0
entry.content:
New Features

Lists can now be customized! Properties like the list name, icon, and background color can be customized per list. In an upcoming release, the ability to create multiple lists will be added.

Other Changes

  • add polish language by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/209
  • Translations update from Hosted Weblate by @weblate in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/210
  • replace url if its the same as the image by @cmintey in https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/pull/211

Full Changelog: https://github.com/cmintey/wishlist/compare/v0.37.3...v0.38.0
